intro: Memecylon clavistaminum, commonly known as the clustered memecylon, is a tropical plant belonging to the Rubiaceae family. It is characterized by its small, elliptical leaves that are often arranged in clusters along the stems. The plant produces small, white or pale yellow flowers that are typically clustered in inflorescences. Its fruit is a small, fleshy capsule that contains several seeds. Memecylon clavistaminum is native to parts of Southeast Asia and is often found in moist, shaded forest environments.
